Constructor Detail

RMICommManager

public RMICommManager(java.lang.String hostName,
                      java.lang.String daemon)
Constructs a new instance of the RMICommManager class with the specified host name and daemon name of the process on the remote host. This constructor defaults the port number to 1099, corresponding to the default port for the RMI registry service.
Parameters:
hostName:Ljava.lang.String - the name of the remote host.
daemon:Ljava.lang.String - the name of the server process running on the remote host.

RMICommManager

public RMICommManager(java.lang.String hostName,
                      java.lang.String portNumber,
                      java.lang.String daemon)
Constructs a new instance of the RMICommManager class with the specified host name, port number and daemon name of the process on the remote host.
Parameters:
hostName:Ljava.lang.String - the name of the remote host.
portNumber:Ljava.lang.String - the port number used by the client and host to communicate.
daemon:Ljava.lang.String - the name of the server process running on the remote host.
Throws:
Ljava.lang.NullPointerException - is the host parameter is null.
Method Detail

connect

public void connect()
             throws CommException
connect connects to the remote daemon service running on the remote host using the specified port number. The stub and skeleton files are transfered over the netword and used by the client to invoke methods/service on the remote object/service.
Overrides:
connect in class AbstractCommManager

service

public java.lang.Object service(java.lang.String methodName,
                                java.lang.Object[] arguments)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
service method makes a server request for a service defined by methodName argument, passing the arguments to the service for the server to carry out it's given task. The method then returns the server's response represented as an Object, or throws Exception if the service failed to complete it's task.
Parameters:
methodName:Ljava.lang.String - name of the service (method) to invoke on the server running on the remote host.
arguments:[Ljava.lang.Object - contains values to parameters to pass to the server's service.
Returns:
a Ljava.lang.Object response of the server's response.
Throws:
Ljava.lang.Exception -
